sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. Kyoto: Kacho Junior College
and other scholarly publications (as referenced). English translations by Marcus Bingenheimer.

projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: tsan dra sū tra
zla ba'i mdo
div.p: From the Derge edition. Derge 042. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 167.
'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/

de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung nas/ de nas lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa yid la byas te/ de'i dus su tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/

lg.l: sangs rgyas dpa' bo de la 'dud/ thams cad myur du grol bar gyis/
bdag 'di'i kha ru bcug pas na/ bdag ni khyed la skyabs su 'gro/

div.p: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba'i ched du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/

lg.l: sangs rgyas 'jig rten la brtses bas/ dgra bcom de bzhin gshegs pa la/
zla pa skyabs su song bas na/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thong/

div.p: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis/ lha'i bu zla ba 'grol bar byas nas/ sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du gang su zhig gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris kyi drung du song zhing songs nas/ sems mi dga' zhing yi mug pas ba spu langs par gyur pas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/

lg.l: ci phyir yid ni skrag par gyur/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thong/
gzugs kyi rnam 'gyur kun du ngan/ ci phyir 'jigs pas 'di ru lhags/
sangs rgyas tshigs bcad thos nas ni/ zla ba bdag gis ma btang na/
mgo bo tshal ba bdun 'gas shing/ 'tsho ba la ni bde ba med/
